prop.head.headtext: Thorburn, Law of Confidential Business Information

prop.head.label.name: Chapter
prop.head.headtext: Practical Advice for Protecting Confidential Business Information

para.paratext: Appropriate procedures can be put in place to control access by unauthorized employees or third parties to areas housing confidential information. A simple log which records the time of visitor entry to and exit from the business or any secure area will normally be sufficient. “Visitor” badges provide an additional level of security by ensuring that visitors are recognizable and can be monitored.
